description:
Get in the zone: complete focus, efficient flow, and confident movement. The low-volume version of the Black Diamond Zone uses incredibly breathable mesh that stretches without bagging out. The down-turned and aggressive shape, along with the sticky Fuse rubber, gives you purchase on tiny footholds on steep terrain.

  • Engineered Knit upper for an exceptional fit that breathes
  • Double Velcro® straps lock in your foot for aggressive heel hooking
  • Minimal, soft flex midsole keeps things sensitive
  • Moulded NeoFriction Fuse rubber provides confidence on small edges and smears
  • LV last suits low-volume feet
  • Members typically size the same as their street shoe size
name: Black Diamond Zone LV Rock Shoes - Unisex
